item.description: This month we are continuing The Greater Boston Scooter Club's popular monthly "Take your scooter to breakfast" event. being held at Soundbites in Somerville. Come on your scooter â€“ riding in the Fall is great as long as you dress appropriately. And if the scooter is in the garage for the winter, come anyway and we can talk about plans for next season. There's lots to discuss, from rides to scooter parking issues.
item.name: What do YOU want to see on the Calendar next season?
